title: Getting Started Guide
content: Welcome to Adrullan! Start by creating your character and choosing your starting region. Complete the tutorial quests to learn basic mechanics. Join a guild early to meet other players and get help. Focus on exploring and trying different activities to find what you enjoy most. Don't worry about min-maxing initially - just have fun!

title: Combat System Guide
content: Combat in Adrullan is action-based and skill-focused. Learn to dodge, time your attacks, and chain abilities for maximum effect. Practice against training dummies before taking on real enemies. Different weapon types have different playstyles - experiment to find what suits you. Positioning and timing matter more than raw damage numbers.
